view.lblTagline: Tanim Tok i go long narapela Tokples
view.dscAdapt: Mekim wok adaptesen i go het moa
view.lblBook: Makim wanem buk i kam long lista bilong buk:
view.lblStatusFullyTranslated: Olgeta ves i gat trenslesen teks.
view.lblStatusPartlyTranslated: Sampela wok i no yet (__lastadapted__ bilong __versecount__ ves olgeta i gat trenslesen teks).
view.dscGetStarted: Yu ken mekim nupela projek, o yu ken kopiim wanpela projek yu bin daunlodim i kam long dispela devais
view.dscProjectSourceLanguage: Taipim nem bilong sos tokples na taipim nem bilong daialek, sapos i gat daialek.
view.dscProjectTargetLanguage: Taipim nem bilong taget tokples na taipim nem bilong daialek, sapos i gat daialek.
view.dscProjectFonts: Sapos yu laik senisim font kala bilong sos, taget o toksave teks, klikim lain. Sapos nogat, klikim Go Neks baten bilong go het.
view.dscProjectPunctuation: Taipim wanwan pangsuesen leta bliong sos tokples, wantaim poroman leta bilong taget tokples.
view.lblPunctuation: Taipim wanwan pangsuesen leta bliong sos tokples, wantaim poroman leta bilong taget tokples.
view.dscProjectCases: Taipim smol kes leta wantaim kapitel kes leta bilong sos tokples na bilong taget tokples.
view.lblCases: Taipim smol kes leta wantaim kapitel kes leta bilong sos tokples na bilong taget tokples daun bilo.
view.lblSourceHasUpperCase: Sos tokples i gat smol kes leta wantaim kapitel kes leta tu
view.lblAutoCapitalize: Usim kapitel kes leta sapos i nidim olsem
view.dscOpenProject: Taipim web adres bilong projek yu laik opim.
view.dscCopyProjInstructions: Selektim projek fail yu laik kopiim i kam long lokal devais
view.dscCopyProject: Kopi projek i kam long narapela devais.
view.dscLanguageCode: Adapt It Mobile identifies the source and target languages by their RFC 5646 code. You can either allow Adapt It Mobile to automatically generate this code or specify the language code yourself.
view.lblRTL: Teks i save stat long han sut na i save ron i go long han kais
view.lblNoAutoCapitalization: No ken mekim kapitel na smol leta long taget teks
view.lblIsVariant: Tokples em i daialek / tanim nek
view.dscImportDocuments: Selektim ol dokumen fail yu laik kopiim i kam long lokal devais. Dispela dokumen i ken stap long USFM fomat, o i ken Adapt It dokumen stret i stap long .xml fomat.
view.dscCopyDocumentFailed: Impot no inap kisim "__document__". As em olsem: __reason__
view.dscErrCannotFindID: no save long dispela buk ID.
view.dscErrImportFirstChapterFirst: dispela em dokumen bilong wok wantaim; plis, yu impotim sapta nambawan pastaim, pinis wokim dispela sapta bihain.
view.dscNoDocumentsFound: No painim ol fail insait long dispela devais. Plis, yu kopiim ol fail i kam long dispela devais pastaim, pinis traiim gen.
view.ttlReset: Setim Adapt It Mobail i go bek long defol
view.dscReset: TOKSAVE: Yu laik setim Adapt It Mobail i go long defol? Sapos selektim "Yes" dispela bai rausim olgeta dokumen wantaim olgeta project na rausim ol nolis bes olgeta. Selektim "No" sapos yu no laik rausim olgeta hat wok yu wokim pinis.
view.dscAdaptContinue: Yu pinisim trenslesen: __chapter__. Yu laik opim na go long neks sapta?
view.dscUserCanSetFilter: Dispela teks i ken kamap insait long wok trenslesen. Lukim USFM Filta.
view.dscUserCannotSetFilter: Teks bilong "__marker__" maka i no inap kamap insait long wok trenslesen.
view.lblUseLanguage: Dispela tokples i painim pinis: "__language__." Usim dispela tokples?
view.hlpdscAdaptPage: Long dispela pes yu ken tanim sos teks i go long taget tokples.
view.hlpdscSelectOne: Long tanim singel word, klikim dispela word na stat long taipim trenslesen bilong dispela word i go long taget tokples.
view.hlpdscUndo: Sapos yu wokim i no stret, yu ken klikim kensel baten na taget teks go bek.
view.hlpttlSelectMultiple: Pulim antap long ol sampela word bilong selektim
view.hlpdscSelectMultiple: Pulim antap long ol sampela word bilong selektim, na trensletim dispela bung wantaim.
view.hlpdscMore: Klikim pas bilong ol kaikai baten na wokim plesholda, ritranslesen, no fres.
view.hlpdscPlaceholder: Sapos insait long trenslesen yu nidim wanpela word o fres we i no stap long sos tokples, klikim plesholda baten bilong subim spes bilong taipim taget word o fres.
view.hlpdscRetranslation: Sapos wanwan sos teks word i nogat mining insait long target teks olsem, yu ken selektim ol dispela sos teks words, na klikim Ritrenslesen baten. Na nau yu ken taipim trenslesen stret bilong dispela olgeta sos teks words yu bin selektim
view.hlpdscPhrase: Klikim Fres baten bilong bungim ol dispela words yu selektim pinis, orait na, yu ken tanim ol dispela words wantaim.
view.hlpttlPrevNext: Go Bek na Go Het baten
view.hlpdscPrevNext: Klikim Go Bek, o, Go Het baten bilong sevim trenslesen na go bek, o, go het long tok we yu no tanim yet.
view.hlpdscMoreActions: Click on the More Actions button to look up translations, find instances of a translation in the project, display a preview of the translated text, or get help for Adapt It Mobile.
view.hlpdscBack: Sapos yu pinis wok, klikim Go Bek baten bilong go bek long stat pes.
view.lblExportSelectDocument: Selektim dokumen yu laik ekspot im i go long lokal devais.
view.lblUseDeviceLanguage: Yusim tokples bilong long lokal devais yet
view.lblWrapAtUSFM: Statim Nupela Lain Long Standet Fomat Maka
view.dscBookName: Sapos yu no laikim dispela nem bilong buk, yu ken senisim hia.
view.dscErrDuplicateKB: Wanpela nolis bes i stap pinis. Adapt It Mobile bai yusim dispela oldpela nolis bes tasol.
view.dscErrCannotFindKB: No inap ritim deta bilong nolis bes. No inap painim vesin namba.
view.dscErrWrongKB: No inap ritim deta bilong nolis bes. No inap painim nem bilong sos tokples o nem bilong taget tokples.
view.dscStatusKBImportSuccess: Nolis Bes "__document__" i ritim gut pinis.
view.dscHiddenTranslation: Dispela trenslesen i stap hait o rausim.
view.errDuplicateTranslation: Dispela trenslesen i stap long lista pinis. Tupela trenslesen i wankain em i tambu. Senisim trenslesen.
view.dscWarnRemoveProject: WARNING: This will remove the selected project and all its data, including any translation work done on this device. Are you sure you want to do this?
view.lblTextRTL: Han sut na i ran i go long han Kais
view.lblTextLTR: Han kais na i ran i go long han sut
view.dscEditProjectSourceLanguage: Correct any errors to the source language and dialect fields. To create a new project, use the Managim Projeks page (Settings > Managim Projeks).
view.dscEditProjectTargetLanguage: Correct any errors to the target language and dialect fields. To create a new project, use the Managim Projeks page (Settings > Managim Projeks).
view.dscWarnChangeProject: Do not modify the project's source and target language to create a new project. New projects can be created in the Managim Projeks page (Settings > Managim Projeks).
